name: Avocado and Cilantro Soup
author: Caliente-Mami
summary: The richness of this tasty chilled soup is balanced by the sharp injection of lime hot pepper sauce. An optional dash of Tequila adds an extra Southwestern kick.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste
directions: In a large food processor, combine the avocado, shallot, chicken broth, tomato paste, hot pepper sauce, lime juice and tequila
Reserve a little bit of cilantro for garnish, then put the rest into the processor
If you have an immersion blender, you may do this in a pot or large bowl
Transfer to a large bowl, cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving
To serve, divide the soup between four chilled bowls
Top with a dollop of sour cream and a sprig of cilantro
